original_text: He went to the towns that belonged to the tribes of Manasseh, Ephraim and Simeon. He even went as far as Naphtali. He did the same thing in all those towns, as well as in the villages around them where nobody lived.
korean_text: 또 므낫세와 에브라임과 시므온과 납달리까지 사면 황폐한 성읍들에도 그렇게 행하여

sentences.original_text: that belonged to the tribes of Manasseh
He even went as far as Naphtali
He did the same thing in all those towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 그 도시들에서 똑같은 일을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: as well as in the villages around them
